title: A vindication of The character of a popish successor, in a reply to two pretended ansvvers to it by the author of the character.
author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.
notes: Attributed to Elkanah Settle.  Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Attributed also to John Phillips. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
